parameters.definition: Units of butter required for an almond croissant
Units of flour required for an almond croissant
Units of butter required for a pistachio croissant
Units of flour required for a pistachio croissant
Proportion of almond croissants relative to pistachio croissants
Production time for an almond croissant
Production time for a pistachio croissant

description: A bakery makes almond and pistachio croissants. An almond croissant requires \param{ButterA} units of butter and \param{FlourA} units of flour. A pistachio croissant requires \param{ButterP} units of butter and \param{FlourP} units of flour. The bakery has available \param{TotalButter} units of butter and \param{TotalFlour} units of flour. Since the almond croissant is more popular, at least \param{AlmondPistachioRatio} times as many almond croissants should be made as pistachio croissants. If making an almond croissant takes \param{TimeA} minutes and making a pistachio croissant takes \param{TimeP} minutes, how many of each should be made to minimize the total production time?
